Title: Building Cloud-Native Applications with Azure
Speaker: Sarah Johnson
Description: Learn how to build scalable cloud-native applications using Azure services. This session covers App Service, Azure Functions, and best practices for cloud architecture.

Title: Azure Storage Solutions Deep Dive
Speaker: Michael Chen
Description: Explore Azure Blob Storage, Table Storage, Queue Storage, and Cosmos DB. Learn when to use each storage type and how to optimize for performance and cost.

Title: Securing Your Azure Applications
Speaker: Emily Rodriguez
Description: Security best practices for Azure applications including Key Vault, Managed Identities, and Azure Active Directory integration.

Title: Implementing Azure Functions and Logic Apps
Speaker: David Kim
Description: Hands-on session covering serverless computing with Azure Functions and workflow automation with Logic Apps.

Title: Containerization with Azure Container Instances
Speaker: Jessica Martinez
Description: Introduction to containerization concepts and deploying containers to Azure Container Instances and Azure Kubernetes Service.

Title: API Management and Integration Patterns
Speaker: Robert Taylor
Description: Learn how to manage, secure, and monitor your APIs using Azure API Management. Covers policies, rate limiting, and authentication.

Title: Monitoring and Diagnostics with Application Insights
Speaker: Amanda White
Description: Master Application Insights for monitoring application performance, tracking custom events, and setting up alerts for your Azure applications.

Title: Event-Driven Architecture with Azure Event Grid
Speaker: James Anderson
Description: Build reactive applications using Azure Event Grid, Service Bus, and Event Hubs. Learn about event-driven patterns and message processing.
